lead_paragraph: YABLON--Leonard. We note with sorrow the passing of our member Leonard Yablon and extend sincerest condolences to his bereaved family. Rabbi Angela W. Buchdahl, President Abigail Pogrebin, Central Synagogue of New York City 1/3
